title: 91/343/EEC: Commission Decision of 14 June 1991 amending Decision 89/3/EEC in regard to health protection measures in connection with imports of certain fresh meat from the State of Santa Catarina, Brazil
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 14 June 1991  amending Decision 89/3/EEC in regard to health protection measures in connection with imports of certain fresh meat from the State of Santa Catarina, Brazil  (91/343/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The State of Santa Catarina is added to the list of States of Brazil set out in Article 1 of Decision 89/3/EEC.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 June 1991. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
